nodes.documentation:
@title A storage method for hospital patients and medical records
 @author Colin John LeMesurier
nodes.name: PatientRecord

nodes.documentation:
Creates a patient with an ID, name, and medicare number,
and initializes the record count of the patient to 0.

     * @param _name       the name of the patient
@param _medicare   the medicare number of patient
nodes.name: createPatient
createRecord
getPatient
getRecord

attributes.documentation:
@title A storage method for hospital patients and medical records
 @author Colin John LeMesurier
attributes.name: PatientRecord

attributes.documentation:
Creates a patient with an ID, name, and medicare number,
and initializes the record count of the patient to 0.

     * @param _name       the name of the patient
@param _medicare   the medicare number of patient
attributes.name: createPatient
createRecord
getPatient
getRecord

devdoc.author: Colin John LeMesurier

params._content: the content of the record entry
params._title: the title of the record entry

params.index: the index for the requested patient

getPatient(uint256).return: the object containing requested patient's data

params.patientIndex: the index of the patient whose record is being requested
params.recordIndex: the index of the record requested

getRecord(uint256,uint256).return: the object of the record requested

devdoc.title: A storage method for hospital patients and medical records

createPatient(string,string).notice: Creates a patient with an ID, name, and medicare number, and initializes the record count of the patient to 0.

createRecord(uint256,string,string).notice: Create a record for a patient specified by ID.

getPatient(uint256).notice: Returns a patient using their ID number as the index.

getRecord(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns a patient's record using the patient ID and record ID as the indices.
